Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Opener \O"pen*er\, n. 1. One who, or that which, opens. ``True opener of my eyes.'' --Milton. [1913 Webster]
2. Specifically: A bottle opener or a can opener; as, you need an opener to get the cap off. [PJC]

opener n 1: the first event in a series; "she played Chopin for her opener"; "the season's opener was a game agains the Yankees" 2: a person who unfastens or unwraps or opens; "children are talented undoers of their shoelaces" [syn: {undoer}, {unfastener}, {untier}] 3: a hand tool used for opening sealed containers (bottles or cans)
